skills.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
desc:
Heals all allies for **9.0%** of Bailu's Max HP plus **90**.
Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn.
The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

skills.name: Gourdful of Elixir
desc:
After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for **3.6%** of Bailu's Max HP plus **36**. This effect can trigger 2 time(s).
When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be **knocked down**. Bailu immediately heals the ally for **12%** of Bailu's Max HP plus **120** HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

skills.name: Saunter in the Rain
desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted Invigoration for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Ambrosial Aqua
eidolons.desc: If the target ally's current HP is equal to their Max HP when Invigoration ends, regenerates 8 extra Energy for this target.

eidolons.name: Sylphic Slumber
eidolons.desc: After using her Ultimate, Bailu's Outgoing Healing increases by an additional 15% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Omniscient Opulence
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Evil Excision
eidolons.desc: Every healing provided by the Skill makes the recipient deal 10% more DMG for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

eidolons.name: Waning Worries
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Drooling Drop of Draconic Divinity
eidolons.desc: Bailu can heal allies who received a killing blow 1 more time(s) in a single battle.

skillTree.name: Qihuang Analects
skillTree.desc: When Bailu heals a target ally above their normal Max HP, the target's Max HP increases by 10% for 2 turns.

skillTree.name: Aquatic Benediction
skillTree.desc: Characters with Invigoration receive 10% less DMG.
